title: 回文数 (Palindrome Number)
content: 思路: // @Title: 回文数 (Palindrome Number) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-01 22:09:19 // @Runtime: 6 ms // @Memory: 41 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public boolean isPalindrome(int x) { char[] shuzu=String.valueOf(x).toCharArray(); for(int i=0;i<shuzu.length/2;i++){ if(shuzu[i]==shuzu[shuzu.length-1-i]){ continue; }else{ return false; } } return true; } }
